about_the_game:
Steampunk x Maze Adventure! Dice Rolls Determine Your Fate!

In a desolate steampunk world, you take on the role of a doll navigating through a 13-floor maze filled with randomly arranged hexagonal tiles. Various events, such as healing items, treasure chests, and dangerous enemy encounters, await at every step. The outcome of each event is determined by dice rolls, adding an exciting tension to the gameplay.

Experience a unique adventure that combines beautiful steampunk design with the distinct mechanics of controlling a doll. Immerse yourself in a world of steampunk and strategy as you make your way to the top floor!

Features:

  • Strategic click adventure on randomly arranged hexagonal tiles

  • Tension-filled dice rolls that decide the outcome of every event

  • A variety of random events like healing, battles, treasure chests, and more

  • A unique blend of steampunk visuals and a dystopian world

  • A thrilling 13-floor journey as you aim for the top!

name: THE THIRTEEN FLOORS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10600 or Intel® Core™ i3-12100F or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Super(VRAM 6GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT(VRAM 6GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11600K or Intel® Core™ i5-12400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X or AMD Ryzen™ 5 5500
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 Super(VRAM 8GB) or NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 4060(VRAM 8GB) or　AMD Radeon™ RX 6700XT(VRAM 12GB)

short_description: In a steampunk dystopia, you play as a doll navigating a 13-floor maze filled with random events like healing, enemies, and treasure. Dice rolls decide your fate as you strategize your way to the top floor.
